title: Generative AI NPC Dialogue System
description: Deployed an API server on Render using the FastAPI framework, integrating an AI for immersive NPC dialogue systems compatible with any game engine.

title: Joystick Controller
description: Built a joystick controller using various components found and connected them to an Arduino Mega 2560. The Arduino communicates with games or software either through JSON or by simulating assigned keybinds and mouse movements.

title: Orbital Mechanics Simulation
description: Developed an Orbital Mechanics simulation in Godot 2D simulating the n-body problem and the use of the polar equation of 2-body orbits.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects and skills effectively.
